extensionAttribute.scriptContentsMac:
#!/bin/bash
#Extension Attribute checks to display Adobe Flash Player Version number
ExtensionVersion=""
if [ -f /Library/Internet\ Plug-Ins/Flash\ Player.plugin/Contents/Info.plist ]; then ExtensionVersion=$(defaults read /Library/Internet\ Plug-Ins/Flash\ Player.plugin/Contents/Info.plist CFBundleShortVersionString) fi
if [ "$ExtensionVersion" == "" ]; then ExtensionVersion="Not Installed" fi
echo "$ExtensionVersion"
exit 0
